ModMetaData.name: ClothMod
ModMetaData.author: k_nord
ModMetaData.description:
v1.6.3
Makes recipes feel little more "logical".
This will make starting scenarios unable to build beds if there's no Cloth added to the base drops.
1.6.3 update: Made compatible with RimWorld 1.4
1.6.2 update: Made compatible with RimWorld 1.3. (No recipe changes from RimWorld 1.2.)
1.6.1 update: Made compatible with RimWorld 1.2.
1.6 update: Made support for RimWorld 1.0 and 1.1. Removed sandbag receipt for WimWorld 1.1. Added packageId for mod 'knord.clothmod'.
1.5 update: Added support for Vanilla Furniture Expanded.
1.4.1 udpate: Removed the added wood to armchair.
1.4 update: Updated reciepts to RimWorld 1.0.
1.3 update: Updated reciepts to RimWorld 0.19 amounts.
1.2 addition: Addes some tests to see if items exists (For mod compability since some mods remove items).
1.1 addition: Changed the armchair to require a little backbone structure (added woodlog).
Vanilla recipe changes: - Sandbag: from 5 steel -> 3 steel and 2 Cloth. (only for RimWorld 1.0) - Bed: Stuff from 45 -> 35 Stuff and 10 Cloth. - Double Bed: Stuff from 85 -> 65 Stuff and 20 Cloth. - Royal Bed: Stuff from 100 and 50 Gold -> 80 Stuff, 50 Gold and 20 Cloth. - Hospital Bed: Steel from 80 -> 70 Steel and 10 Cloth.
Vanilla Furniture Expanded recipe changes: - Simple bed: from 40 stuff -> 35 stuff and 5 cloth. - Ergonomic bed: from 60 stuff -> 50 stuff and 10 cloth. - Double Ergonomic bed: from 110 stuff -> 90 stuff and 20 cloth. - Kingsize bed: from 120 stuff -> 100 stuff and 20 cloth.
